column4: Hi, how do i chance my refresh rate from 75 to 70 in resolution 1280x1024?
there should be such thing in monitor settings
just set everything up and in monitor settings choose "advanced"
everyhting works fine, but i need to lower my hz, but cant see a way to do that
when you'll follow this configurator,he'll ask you for a new value
ubuntus screen resolution preferences wont allow me to lower my refresh rate
manage lower refresh rate than its doing right now?
its i'm using now 1280x1024@75 but i want to use 1280x1024@70
all i can say then is... edit the xorg.conf file ;)
there should be something like this:
theres only range, and its correct
